QuestData.Title: The Blood Gate
QuestData.Description: We just received word that the Northern border is under heavy attack by an army of blood trolls.$b$bKing Rastakhan has called for reinforcements.$b$bYou are more familiar with that threat than any of us. Go and do what you can to help them.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with King Rastakhan at the Blood Gate.
